subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: If there were records in the Stanley Cup finals for taunting, petulance and sniping, the Canucks-Bruins series might hold several of them, even before Game 6 was played Monday.
snippet: If there were records in the Stanley Cup finals for taunting, petulance and sniping, the Canucks-Bruins series might hold several of them, even before Game 6 was played Monday.
